subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Despite Townsend’s third-round loss at the French Open, there is no doubt it is a great deal of fun to watch her play and to listen to her talk about it afterward.
snippet: Despite Townsend’s third-round loss at the French Open, there is no doubt it is a great deal of fun to watch her play and to listen to her talk about it afterward.
